title: Biohazard Quarantine Zone Adventure #103
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Decontamination Chamber
rooms.description: A sterile white chamber with harsh fluorescent lighting. Yellow and black biohazard symbols cover the walls. Chemical showers line one side, and a hazmat suit hangs on a rack. The air smells of disinfectant. Emergency lights flash red, and a computerized voice repeats: 'Quarantine Protocol Active.'

items.name: emergency supply locker
items.description: A metal locker with medical supplies and equipment

items.name: facility emergency map
items.description: A laminated map showing the quarantine facility layout
items.text: FACILITY MAP: Decontamination Chamber (Level 1) - Research Laboratory (Level 2) - Emergency Exit (Level 3). WARNING: Outbreak occurred in Sample Storage on 28-47. All personnel must evacuate.

items.name: security access keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard labeled 'Research Level Access'

items.name: hazmat equipment rack
items.description: A rack holding protective gear and equipment

items.name: handheld contamination scanner
items.description: A device for detecting biohazard contamination levels

items.name: decontamination terminal
items.description: A computer terminal displaying quarantine protocols
items.text: DECONTAMINATION PROTOCOL: Facility placed under quarantine by Chief Scientist Doctor Elena Reeves. Pathogen designation: Strain X-7. Containment breach in cold storage unit. All staff must report to emergency assembly point.

items.name: sealed laboratory door
items.description: A heavy reinforced door with a card reader and biohazard warning

rooms.name: Research Laboratory
rooms.description: A large laboratory filled with scientific equipment, microscopes, and containment units. Broken glass litters the floor. Research posters cover the walls showing various pathogen studies. Computer monitors display flashing error messages. A massive vault door dominates the far wall, leading to the emergency exit.

items.name: research poster by Doctor Chen
items.description: A poster detailing viral mutation research
items.text: Pathogen Research - Doctor Chen, Virology Department. Study focus: Strain X-7 mutation rates. Key finding: Pathogen remains dormant in cold storage below -80 degrees Celsius.

items.name: research poster by Doctor Malik
items.text: Containment Protocols - Doctor Malik, Safety Division. Primary containment location: Cold Storage Unit. Emergency protocol: Evacuate to the emergency assembly point on Level 3.

items.name: research poster by Doctor Torres
items.description: A poster showing vaccine development progress
items.text: Vaccine Development - Doctor Torres, Immunology. Lead researcher: Doctor Elena Reeves. Current status: Phase 2 trials. Vaccine samples stored in secure refrigeration.

items.name: research desk
items.description: A cluttered desk covered with papers, sample vials, and lab equipment

items.name: research notes of Doctor Chen
items.description: A notebook filled with scientific observations
items.text: Research Log: Strain X-7 shows unprecedented mutation rate. Doctor Reeves has ordered enhanced containment. Sample X-7 must remain in cold storage. Temperature breach on 28-47 caused partial thaw. Immediate quarantine initiated.

items.name: sample tracking log
items.text: SAMPLE LOG: Strain X-7 stored in Cold Storage Unit. Responsible scientist: Doctor Elena Reeves. Storage date: February 28, 2047 (28-47). Status: CONTAINMENT BREACH DETECTED.

items.name: secure filing cabinet
items.description: A locked cabinet containing confidential research files

items.name: personnel identification file
items.description: A file containing staff information and credentials
items.text: PERSONNEL FILE: Chief Scientist - Doctor Elena Reeves, ID Badge #ER-2047. Clearance Level: Maximum. Authorized for all facility areas including emergency exit protocols.

items.name: ID badge of Doctor Chen
items.description: An identification badge found on the desk

items.name: emergency vault door
items.description: A massive reinforced door with a security terminal. Three verification questions are displayed on the screen.

password_questions.question: Who is the Chief Scientist?
password_questions.hint: Check the decontamination terminal and personnel files

password_questions.question: Where is the pathogen stored?
password_questions.hint: Look at the research posters and sample logs

password_questions.question: Where is the emergency assembly point?
password_questions.hint: The facility map and research posters mention this

rooms.name: Emergency Exit Chamber
rooms.description: You have reached the emergency exit! A decontamination airlock leads to the outside world. Through the reinforced window, you can see the night sky and emergency vehicles with flashing lights. A final decontamination shower activates automatically, washing away any contamination. The exit door opens, and fresh air rushes in.

items.name: exit control terminal
items.description: A terminal displaying evacuation status and all-clear signals

items.name: emergency evacuation supplies
items.description: A cache of supplies for evacuees including water, medical kits, and communication devices

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have successfully navigated the quarantine facility and reached the emergency exit. The decontamination process is complete, and you are cleared to leave. Emergency response teams are waiting outside to ensure your safety. The facility will remain sealed until the biohazard is fully contained. You have escaped the Biohazard Quarantine Zone! You win!
